title: The plot to be permitted for such development shall be not less than 4000 sq
clause_text: The plot to be permitted for such development shall be not less than 4000 sq.m. with the maximum FSI of 0.025.
section: Regulations for G-1 Zone (Yeur village Section - VII only)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
